page.title: 15Population
page.content: Darton is the largest settlement in our area and accounts for the largest proportion of its population.The remaining land area is mainly agricultural with the odd isolated farmstead and numerous small villages. {Census}figures for 1984 tell us that the area had a population of approximately 9764 people.From these figures we can pick out general trends about population.The{birthrate}for example is falling and this is shown by falling roles in our local schools. The highest proportion of people in our area are between 45 and 64 years of age.In addition to this we noted that there were more females over the age of 75 than males.In the 0 to 4 age group more males than females are born.Many people are{migrating,} possibly due to the lack of jobs.
